医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学 AMTAR 中心推动超精确癌症药物的开发昆士兰大学新开设的研究和制造中心正在生产一系列超精确的癌症药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/UQs-AMTAR-hub-advances-the-development-of-hyper-accurate-cancer-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/UQs-AMTAR-hub-advances-the-development-of-hyper-accurate-cancer-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=797d4c62-b56e-4fc5-8747-1fe3fb8a704e Tue, 07 May 2024 22:01:22 -0400 UQ's AMTAR hub advances the development of hyper-accurate cancer drugs
韦恩州立大学研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院拨款用于治疗糖尿病眼部感染韦恩州立大学医学院眼科、视觉和解剖科学教授 Fu-Shin Yu 博士因其旨在扭转不良影响的研究而获得美国国立卫生研究院国家眼科研究所颁发的奖项糖尿病对视力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Wayne-State-University-researcher-receives-NIH-grant-to-tackle-diabetic-eye-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Wayne-State-University-researcher-receives-NIH-grant-to-tackle-diabetic-eye-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdd85656-cf6a-4067-9f02-ee9285c0525f Tue, 07 May 2024 21:55:28 -0400 Wayne State University researcher receives NIH grant to tackle diabetic eye infections
加州大学洛杉矶分校健康研讨会探讨迷幻疗法与生态医学的融合加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心将于本周举办一场独特的研讨会，探讨迷幻疗法的不断发展的研究，以及如何将其与重新连接自然世界相结合，以帮助扩大其对心理健康的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/UCLA-Health-symposium-explores-the-fusion-of-psychedelic-therapies-and-ecological-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/UCLA-Health-symposium-explores-the-fusion-of-psychedelic-therapies-and-ecological-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8f8e88-bfdc-44cf-8182-18ff79c20e62 Tue, 07 May 2024 21:41:12 -0400 UCLA Health symposium explores the fusion of psychedelic therapies and ecological medicine
新型 PET 显像剂有望使透明细胞肾细胞癌患者的病变可视化根据《核医学杂志》五月号上发表的新研究，一种新型研究性 PET 显像剂可以快速准确地显示透明细胞肾细胞癌 (ccRCC) 患者的病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/New-PET-imaging-agent-shows-promise-in-visualizing-lesions-in-clear-cell-renal-cell-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/New-PET-imaging-agent-shows-promise-in-visualizing-lesions-in-clear-cell-renal-cell-cancer-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f54c2ee-db03-437e-a7b2-10584455b2e3 Tue, 07 May 2024 21:33:14 -0400 New PET imaging agent shows promise in visualizing lesions in clear cell renal cell cancer patients

大麻籽蛋白有望降低血压《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究表明，大麻籽蛋白及其生物活性肽可以显着降低轻度高血压成人的血压，为控制高血压提供潜在的饮食干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Hemp-seed- Protein-shows-promise-in-lowering-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Hemp-seed- Protein-shows-promise-in-lowering-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abcc1b0e-1a88-415e-b3e0-9235fdc62ea1 Tue, 07 May 2024 19:04:00 -0400 Hemp seed protein shows promise in lowering blood pressure

Broken String Biosciences 与弗朗西斯·克里克研究所合作推进 ALS 研究合作扩大 DNA 断裂图谱技术的应用，并加深对神经退行性疾病肌萎缩侧索硬化症发展中基因组不稳定性的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Broken-String-Biosciences-and-the-Francis-Crick-Institute-collaborate-to-advance-ALS-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Broken-String-Biosciences-and-the-Francis-Crick-Institute-collaborate-to-advance-ALS-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e1b3a1d-7df8-48ad-b1a9-62a98155cc97 Tue, 07 May 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences and the Francis Crick Institute collaborate to advance ALS research
研究发现瑞典新生儿抗生素使用不合理瑞典新生儿因疑似败血症而接受抗生素治疗的程度不合理。这是根据哥德堡大学对超过一百万新生儿进行的一项研究得出的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-finds-unjustified-antibiotic-administration-in-Swedish-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-finds-unjustified-antibiotic-administration-in-Swedish-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea2f989b-accd-492d-9617-1f2042178209 Tue, 07 May 2024 06:46:00 -0400 Study finds unjustified antibiotic administration in Swedish newborns
安进公司不顾 FDA 的挑战，继续推进成本高昂、剧毒的癌症剂量当医生们在 2021 年开始使用 sotorasib 药物时，对其治疗肺癌的创新方法抱有很高的期望，退休医疗技术员 Don Crosslin 是早期受益者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Amgen-plows-ahead-with-costly-highly-毒-cancer-dosing-despite-FDA-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Amgen-plows-ahead-with-costly-highly-有毒-cancer-dosing-despite-FDA-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87a13fb5-7f2f-4c66-bf32-e4f76f9c60c4 Tue, 07 May 2024 06:38:00 -0400 Amgen plows ahead with costly, highly toxic cancer dosing despite FDA challenge
